---
name: New Skill Submission
about: Submit a new skill for the starter kit
labels: skill-submission
---

## Skill name
e.g., `competitor-analysis`

## Category
- [ ] Core
- [ ] Expert
- [ ] Persona
- [ ] Specialized
- [ ] Workflow
- [ ] Utility

## Description
What does this skill do? What PM workflow does it support?

## SKILL.md
```yaml
---
name: skill-name
description: Brief description
category: core
tags: [tag1, tag2]
tools: [tool1, tool2]
---
```

## How it works
Describe the skill's approach, steps, and any special requirements.
